Posts.Content: Jan 3, 2014 08:32AM CSbigtime wrote: I have been in cohort 3 (400mg dose) of the ARN-810 trial for 2 1/2 months.  After 8 weeks my scans showed stable disease, first time in 6 months.  I am wondering if there is anyone else out there on this trial who I can connect with.  I stumbled on this site from a google search.  I have never joined one of these sites before, so not sure how it works.  I am just looking to find someone else on the trial to compare side effects with.  I am at Vanderbilt in Nashville.  Thanks
Posts.Title: Clinical Trial for ER+ Receptor Degradation Bestbird 20130502
